title: [Medicine] Shark antibody-like proteins neutralize COVID-19 virus, help prepare for future coronaviruses

[Social Science] A cluster-randomized trial on the effect of community-level mask distribution and promotion on symptomatic SARS-CoV-2 infections in rural Bangladesh (N = 342k) finds proper mask-wearing increased from 13.3% in the control group to 42.3% in the intervention arm
